PackageOracle.name: DA_MOVIE_TITLE
PackageOracle.source:
CREATE OR REPLACE PACKAGE CHTR.DA_MOVIE_TITLE
/* Generated on 20-JAN-15 03.40.01.435015000 PM -06:00 */
AS

FUNCTION add (
process_rec IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec
,year_num IN VARCHAR2
,box_office_amt IN NUMBER
,movie_kind_type_cd IN VARCHAR2
,audit_user IN VARCHAR2
) return NUMBER;

PROCEDURE add (
process_rec IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec
,year_num IN VARCHAR2
,box_office_amt IN NUMBER
,movie_kind_type_cd IN VARCHAR2
,audit_user IN VARCHAR2
);

PROCEDURE add (
process_rec IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec
,title_id IN NUMBER
,year_num IN VARCHAR2
,box_office_amt IN NUMBER
,movie_kind_type_cd IN VARCHAR2
,audit_user IN VARCHAR2
);

PROCEDURE del (
process_rec IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec
,title_id IN NUMBER
,audit_user IN VARCHAR2
);

END da_movie_title;

body.name: DA_MOVIE_TITLE
body.source:
CREATE OR REPLACE PACKAGE BODY CHTR.DA_MOVIE_TITLE
/* Generated on 20-JAN-15 03.40.01.446170000 PM -06:00 */
AS

FUNCTION add (
process_rec IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec
,year_num IN VARCHAR2
,box_office_amt IN NUMBER
,movie_kind_type_cd IN VARCHAR2
,audit_user IN VARCHAR2
) RETURN NUMBER
IS
l_return_pk NUMBER;
BEGIN

chtr.pkg_logging.log_debug (process_rec, 'begin da_movie_title.add(fx), parms=' || year_num || '|' || box_office_amt || '|' || movie_kind_type_cd || '|' || audit_user || '|');
INSERT INTO chtr.t_movie_title a
(
a.title_id
,a.year_num
,a.box_office_amt
,a.movie_kind_type_cd
,a.record_stat
,a.created_dttm
,a.created_by
,a.modified_dttm
,a.modified_by
)
VALUES
(
chtr.s_title_id.NEXTVAL
,add.year_num
,add.box_office_amt
,add.movie_kind_type_cd
,'A'
,SYSTIMESTAMP
,add.audit_user
,NULL
,NULL
) RETURNING a.title_id INTO l_return_pk;
chtr.pkg_logging.log_debug (process_rec, 'end da_movie_title.add(fx)');
RETURN l_return_pk;

END add;

PROCEDURE add (
process_rec IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec
,year_num IN VARCHAR2
,box_office_amt IN NUMBER
,movie_kind_type_cd IN VARCHAR2
,audit_user IN VARCHAR2
)
IS
BEGIN

chtr.pkg_logging.log_debug (process_rec, 'begin da_movie_title.add, parms=' || year_num || '|' || box_office_amt || '|' || movie_kind_type_cd || '|' || audit_user || '|');
INSERT INTO chtr.t_movie_title a
(
a.title_id
,a.year_num
,a.box_office_amt
,a.movie_kind_type_cd
,a.record_stat
,a.created_dttm
,a.created_by
,a.modified_dttm
,a.modified_by
)
VALUES
(
chtr.s_title_id.NEXTVAL
,add.year_num
,add.box_office_amt
,add.movie_kind_type_cd
,'A'
,SYSTIMESTAMP
,add.audit_user
,NULL
,NULL
);
chtr.pkg_logging.log_debug (process_rec, 'end da_movie_title.add');

END add;

PROCEDURE add (
process_rec IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec
,title_id IN NUMBER
,year_num IN VARCHAR2
,box_office_amt IN NUMBER
,movie_kind_type_cd IN VARCHAR2
,audit_user IN VARCHAR2
)
IS
BEGIN

chtr.pkg_logging.log_debug (process_rec, 'begin da_movie_title.add, parms=' || title_id || '|' || year_num || '|' || box_office_amt || '|' || movie_kind_type_cd || '|' || audit_user || '|');
INSERT INTO chtr.t_movie_title a
(
a.title_id
,a.year_num
,a.box_office_amt
,a.movie_kind_type_cd
,a.record_stat
,a.created_dttm
,a.created_by
,a.modified_dttm
,a.modified_by
)
VALUES
(
add.title_id
,add.year_num
,add.box_office_amt
,add.movie_kind_type_cd
,'A'
,SYSTIMESTAMP
,add.audit_user
,NULL
,NULL
);
chtr.pkg_logging.log_debug (process_rec, 'end da_movie_title.add');

END add;

PROCEDURE del (
process_rec IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec
,title_id IN NUMBER
,audit_user IN VARCHAR2
)
IS
BEGIN

chtr.pkg_logging.log_debug (process_rec, 'begin da_movie_title.del, parms=' || title_id || '|' || audit_user || '|');
UPDATE chtr.t_movie_title a
SET a.record_stat = 'D'
,a.modified_dttm = SYSTIMESTAMP
,a.modified_by = del.audit_user
WHERE a.title_id = del.title_id
;
chtr.pkg_logging.log_debug (process_rec, 'end da_movie_title.del');

END del;

END da_movie_title;
